const response = await client.search({
  aggs: {
    genres: {
      terms: {
        field: "genre",
        order: {
          max_play_count: "desc",
        },
      },
      aggs: {
        max_play_count: {
          max: {
            field: "play_count",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
